name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education
Management and insurance for engineering risks

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容在於介紹工程保險之理論與應用，透過理論及案例分析，使學生具有工程保險應有之知識與技術，進而能夠在工程計劃規劃及進行期間能夠對工程中所存在的 風險提供足夠的保障及避免保險理賠爭議。
description.en: The main content of this course is to introduce the theories and applications of engineering insurance. Through theories and case studies student who take this class will have enough knowledge and technique of engineering insurance to avoid insurance claims debate and provide indemnity to the risk that might encounter during planning and processing of a project.

notes: 四材三乙四材四乙與最後一哩合開

description.zh: (1)輻射度學與光度學基本參數介紹-流明、燭光、勒克斯、尼特 (2)光的量測-總光功率量測、光強角分布、光譜量測、色溫量測、演色性量測 (3)配光曲線與照明簡單範例計算 (4)室內照明標準與照明規畫 (5)道路照明與CIE道路照明標準 (6) Dialux照明專用軟體介紹 (7) Dialux室內照明設計實例 (8) Dialux道路照明設計實例(9) Dialux體育場照明設計實例(10) Dialux景觀照明設計實例
description.en: (1)Radiometry and Photometry-lm,cd,lux,nit(2)Light Measurement-Total flux,Intensity distribution,spectrum measurement,CCT,CRI (3) Luminaries Angular profile and design example(4) Interior illumination standard(5) CIE Road lighting standard (6) Introduction to Dialux software (7) Case study: Interior Lighting Design Using Dialux(8) Case study: Road Lighting Design Using Dialux (9) Case study: Stadium Lighting Design Using Dialux (10) Case study: Landscape Lighting Design Using Dialux

notes: 四光四與最後一哩合開，修課上限15人

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務講座
name.en: Practice Institute Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本國際專業證照研訓實務講座課程針對國內外國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 經管三與最後一哩合開,修課人數上限45人

name.zh: 國際觀培養-北科校友‧放眼世界
name.en: Developing Global Perspectives - Going beyond the Campus from Experiences of NTUT Alumni

description.zh: 本課程邀請歷屆傑出校友分享其國際實務經驗，進而激發同學追求國際化的渴望，強化學生對人生願景的規劃，使其在國際交流活動上有更為積極的作用。
description.en: This course invites a number of outstanding alumni to share their experiences and thoughts on developing global perspectives and to instill in students the meaning a global citizen in today's world. The goal is to inspire students to engage in international activities and, ultimately, to plan a future with an international mindset.

notes: 四管二、經管所與最後一哩合開,二ABC上課,限300人

name.zh: 創業講座-北科校友‧標竿企業

description.zh: 本課程邀請歷屆傑出校友分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: This course will invite excellent graduates of NTUT to share their successful experiences of starting a new enterprise. The main purpose of this course is to let students have the chance for learning the entrepreneurship by the real successful experiences of the graduates. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管二、經管所與最後一哩合開,三ABC上課,限300人

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en:
Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication 
and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. 
The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

description.zh:
講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD
繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確
表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh:
從人類、社會、人文學上探討人性、設計倫理與資源、經濟之關係，
建立設計之推行及正確理念。
description.en: Lecture on the development of prime influences on design domestically and internationally, with emphasis on the work of key industrial designers. Discussion sessions with reading assignments will be carried out through the course, and submission of a written report is required.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC, BULATS and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

notes: 共同選修,不列入畢業學分,限55人含北區跨校5人

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

notes: 共同選修,不列入畢業學分,北區跨校限5人

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 室內設計在3D場景的應用，包括模型的建立，燈光材質的設定以及整體設計之搭配。
description.en: The Application of interior design in 3D scene, including the setting-up of model, establishment of the light material and matching of integrated design.

name.zh: 逆向工程與快速原型（一）
name.en: Reverse Engineering and  Rapid prototyping Practice （一）

description.zh: 從點群掃描、建構曲面、實體、分析與檢測並轉出Stl檔等逆向工程流程到快速原型加工原理、系統分類做實務介紹與製造
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques used in Reverse Engineering (RE). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of RE, 3D measurement principles, surface digitization strategies, curve and surface modeling and the introduction of rapid prototyping system.

description.zh: 透過多類型之作業演練，分析及探討由視覺衍生之知覺性及感情效果於平面設計上之影響，開發一套可供工業設計運用的基本視覺設計原裡。
description.en: Through multiple creative design projects, analyzing and discussing visual cognition affect graphic design work, Develop a basic system of visual communication usage for industrial design.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

name.zh: 創意與創新管理事業化
name.en: How to implement innovation into realized enterprise

description.zh: 在許多場合，無論是研討會、交流會等均會有許多創意點子出現，但多數的點子有如雨水一般，如果不能蓄存，散落後就消失；反之如果有系統收集，它就成為企業創新的主要來源，而透過企業創新的多元面向，如產品創新、流程創新、行銷創新等，均可為企業帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程主要內容有產品創新、流程創新、經營模式創新、行銷創新、識別系統創新、組織創新、新事業創新、創意與創新管理事業化等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。
description.en: In many seminar and mutual discussion cases, there are many good ideas happened. But innovation like rain fall, if we don't have reservoir to keep it, It will rain everywhere and disappeared. If we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to enterprise and rises its competing ability. From "How to establish an enterprise" classes, We find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise.

notes: 四管三與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代之交通工具設計工程師所需要之基礎知識與實務技能。交通工具設計是一門跨領域先進知識與技術整合的工程，也是進階的專業設計學問。因此本課程將以實作為基礎，訓練學生如何從無中生有、工程藍圖之計畫及工程上的執行，以完全符合交通工具設計實務上國際要求之標準。學生可從中學習如何設計並實現自己的創作，並培養時程掌握、執行藍圖與油土工程、模具開發技術養成以及部品組裝之能力。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of transportation design practice. Transportation design is a cross-discipline engineering which integrates advanced technology and knowledge. This practice based course allows students to learn and execute all the tasks involved in the professional to meet the international standard, through creative concept development, blueprint drawing, clay modeling and mold making.

notes: 四創意三四,四車三四與最後一哩合開,實習在綜科B05

name.zh: 創新講座-北科校友．創新與管理

description.zh: 本課程係提供全校學生與實務界交流的平台，提供學生建立創新發展與管理的理論與實務經驗，透過邀請本校傑出校友進行專題講座，返校分享其企業創新與管理之經驗，以作為學生未來創業與創新工作之參考。
description.en: This program provides a platform for whole school students to interact with the enterprises and practitioners and helps students to establish theories and practical experiences of innovative developments and managements. For the whole school students, this program can be a reference for future work by inviting distinguished alumni to address lectures to share innovative and management experiences of the enterprises.

notes: 四設四、創新所與最後一哩合開,大學部限140人,周一ABC

description.zh:
本課程配合雷射與光電工程課程，期使光電課程能完整的包括理論與實務部份。
內容包括：
１.光電實驗簡介
２.光的反射與折射
３.光的成像
４.光的偏極化
５.光的干涉與繞射
６.光功率計
７.雷射特性量測
８.光纖特性研究
９.光纖ＮＡ測量
１０.光纖Ｌｏｓｓ測量
１１.光纖之連接
１２.光纖訊系統
１３.專題
description.en:
Course content 
1.Introduction 
2.Reflection and Refraction 
3.Imaging 
4.Ploariztion 
5.Interference and Dissraction
6.optical power Meter
7.Laser characteistic 
8.Fiber End preparation 
9.Fiber NA 
10.Fiber Loss 
11.Fiber connector 
12.Fiber optic communication 
13.apecial Topics

name.zh: 就業達人講座-卓越校友職場聖經

description.zh:
適逢建校百週年，本課程邀請卓越校友回母校與同學交流，以最貼近學生觀點之角度切入議題，協助學生在面臨就業之際能事前做好身心靈準備。

本學期蒞校之卓越校友分別來自六個學院不同領域，除了帶來最新產業趨勢及業界人才需求等資訊，更以學長姐身份分享多年職場經驗及成功策略，並指導同學如何運用北科大之資源為自己加值，傳承為北科大量身訂做的就業聖經，以強化學生職場力與人生定位之觀念，進而提升本校學生之就業戰力。
description.en: "This course invites a number of outstanding alumni, including six different collage fields, to share their experiences about employment issues from students’ viewpoint and to inspire them for the coming challenges. These alumni will address the newest industrial trend and information about the required manpower; moreover, by establishing these professional information and successful job strategies, students can strengthen the abilities of knowing when to act and what action to take in companies. Gradually, they are willing, with enthusiastic minds, to make efforts on their job. Therefore, these alumni experiences will benefit students on their competition towards the future."

notes: 四電四甲、電機所與最後一哩合開,限200人,三ABC上課

description.zh: 本課程包括概論、距離測量、水準測量、經緯儀測量、導線測量、平板儀測量、地形測量、礦區測量等。實習課程包括距離測量操作、水準測量操作、經緯儀測量、導線測量實作、平板儀測量實習、地形測量實習、礦區測量實習等
description.en: The surveying class includes general introduction, distance measurement, leveling measurement, theodolite, traversing, plane table surveying, topographical surveying and mine surveying. The surveying lab. is designed for student to operate various surveying equipment and instruments. It includes distance measuring, leveling measurement, theodolite, traversing surveying, plane table surveying, topographical surveying and mine surveying.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

notes: 二年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

notes: 二年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

notes: 博雅核心-法治,限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代之交通工具設計工程師所需要之基礎知識與實務技能。交通工具設計是一門跨領域先進知識與技術整合的工程，也是進階的專業設計學問。因此本課程將以實作為基礎，訓練學生如何從無中生有、工程藍圖之計畫及工程上的執行，以完全符合交通工具設計實務上國際要求之標準。學生可從中學習如何設計並實現自己的創作，並培養時程掌握、執行藍圖與油土工程、模具開發技術養成以及部品組裝之能力。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of transportation design practice. Transportation design is a cross-discipline engineering which integrates advanced technology and knowledge. This practice based course allows students to learn and execute all the tasks involved in the professional to meet the international standard, through creative concept development, blueprint drawing, clay modeling and mold making.

notes: 四創意三四,四車三四與最後一哩合開,實習在綜科B05

description.zh: 本課程主要在研討傳統的結構化語言的編譯技術。課程所所涵蓋的內容包括有： - 語句上的分析、語句分析器的製作 - 由上而下的組譯器製作 - 由下而上的組譯器製作 - 語意分析 - 機器碼之產生與暫存器之配置 - 資料流分析的理論與應用 - 程式碼最佳化處理。課程的實施，將以基本編譯技術為主，作深入的介紹。學習所得的觀念與技術，將利用一個實驗性語言編譯器的實作來貫穿。因此，程式規畫實作，將在這個課程中，佔有相當大的比重。
description.en: This course discusses issues in the compilation of conventional block-structured languages, as listed below. - lexical analysis, scanner generators; - top-down parsing, LL(1) parsers; - bottom-up parsing SLR, LALR, LR(1) parsers, parser generators; - semantic analysis; - code generation and register allocation, code generator generators; - dataflow analysis: theory and practice; - code optimization. There will be a significant programming component to the course

description.zh: 本課程基於資料管理的複雜性與實務需求，介紹雲端資訊管理需求的儲存技術基礎架構與相關技術，使學生對雲端儲存與管理有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統的架構基礎 2. 儲存網路技術和虛擬化技術 3. 業務持續運作儲存技術 4. 儲存架構安全與管理 5. 雲端排程技術 6. 雲端效能與安全測試 7. 期末專題設計
description.en: This course covers the technical foundations of cloud information storage management as well as the practice of storage management through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage System 2. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization 3. Business Continuity 4. Storage Security and Management 5. Cloud Scheduling 6. Cloud Performance and Security Testing 7. Final Project.

description.zh:
本課程將帶領同學從兒童詩、繪本、小說、電影來品味兒童文學的真、善與美，藉此喚醒被世俗蒙塵的沉睡心靈，以重返純真的赤子心境。
教學方式以互動為主，期待藉由討論兒童文學名著，來帶領同學進入兒童文學的殿堂。
除了閱讀與討論之外，還會教導同學創作；創作的內容含括了兒童詩及手工繪本製作。希望透過作品的完成，來喚起學生的創作興趣，並建立學生創作的信心。
description.en:
This course will lead the students to read the poems, picture books, novels and films of children literature, and hope to find out the beauty of the children's world. Wish in this way can help the sleeping soul to wake up, and return to pure childhood state.
This course will try to lead the classmates to appreciate the children's literature by discussing and questioning the masterpieces, hope in this happy way to help the students to get enter the children's literature.
Besides reading and discussing, the course will also teach students how to write. The content of writing course would include the poem and the story which would ask the students to finish the work by themselves.
Hope through the works, can arouse students' creation interest, and build up students' confidence of creation.

notes: 請選博雅選修(六)-文學向度

description.zh: 本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。
description.en: The main features of two great sources of early western civilizations, that is (1) Greek mythology and tragedies, and (2) Hebrew Biblical tradition, will be introduced to the students in the most exciting stories about Greek heroes and heroines as well as Biblical figures and events.

name.zh: 紡織產業升級之創新技術

description.zh: 本課程針對紡織產業技術升級之議題，邀請跨領域之企業家及專家進行創新技術演講。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of textile industries in the new millennium. This course will invite well-known entrepreneurs and experts to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

notes: 四分四與最後一哩合開,含部分參訪實習課程

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 四資三與四電資二合開

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
中文課程共分四年三階段授課。
第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。
第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。
第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en:
The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. 
In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.
In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. 
In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh:
圖學課程概述
【上學期】授課內容: 圖學基礎
著重於基礎圖學與繪圖能力的建構，並導入基本設計練習。
(理論上，視各位大一同學基本能力為零從頭教起)
教學內容:
字體、線條、平面造型、三視圖、立體圖、剖面、一點透視、二點透視、草模製作
【下學期】授課內容: 建築製圖
著重於建築設計常用圖面與表現法之繪製能力建立。
(本課程與下學期之大一建築設計、表現法相互接軌，其設計作品之圖面、模型部份作為本課程之作業成績)
教學內容:
陰影、速寫、景物描繪、平面圖、立面圖、剖面圖、分解圖、設計說明、配置、版面設計
description.en: The course objective is to train students understanding and fully employing the emerging technology of drawing methods in the architectural design process. The main topics base on CNS standards of Architectural drawing, and contents include: Site analysis, Plan, Section, etc. Finally, a series of exercises seeks to expand students' abilities to utilize various software packages of computer graphics.

description.zh:
講解建築計畫的基本精神、方法及各種類型建築的案例分析
其授課主題為：一、建築計畫之基本精神：1.計劃和生活、
生產的關係、2.建築計畫之定位；二、建築計畫之方法：1.
建築之定性、2.計畫之調查、分析、3.尺寸與規模計畫、4.
空間與構造計畫；三、案例分析。
description.en: Introduce the basic philosophy & method of architecture planning. Case studies ofdifferent building types. The topic include：1、	the basic philosophy of architecture planningl	the relationship between planning and living l	the scope of architecture planning 2、	the method of architecture planningl	the quality of architecturel	the investigation & analysis of planningl	size & scale planningl	space & construction planning 3、	case study

description.zh: 本課程分四年（八學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實。第四學年----學生們將以一個完整的題目分為兩個學期作為設計練習，使他們在建築設計上更多元思考以及練習所學習的專業技能。
description.en: This course is organized, as a four-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of eight semesters. The modular teaching structure is: An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety , order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometric ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationship.

description.zh:
本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。
1.類比設計概述
2.基本MOS元件物理特性
3.單級放大器
4.差動放大器
5.頻率響應
6.雜訊分析
7.回授
8.運算放大器
9.振盪器
10.鎖相迴路
description.en:
This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 
1.Introduction o analog design
2.Basic MOS device physics
3.Single-stage amplifiers
4.Differential amplifiers
5.Frequency response
6.Noise
7.Feedback
8.Operational amplifiers
9.Oscillators
10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，8.認識Cadence系統，9.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，10.零件庫介紹，11.設計電路之輸入編輯，12.電路模擬實習，13.數位電路的晶片設計，14. 電路自動化設計15.晶片製造專題。
description.en: 1.Basic CMOS logic design 2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement 4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit 6.VHDL system 7.Introduction to c cadence system 8.Graphic editor practice 9.module 10.Input editor 11.Circuit simulation practice 12. Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

notes: 四資四與四子四甲乙合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。運動方程式、一維振動（自由及強制）、振動量測、二維振動、多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced),Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

name.zh: 室內設計與裝修證照概論
name.en: License of Interior Design and Decoration

description.zh: 整合學科與術科兩大部分，本課程介紹【建築物室內設計】與【建築物室內裝修工程管理】專業技能檢定事宜。參酌最新專業議題並研習歷屆考試題庫，課程加強學／術科模擬考試訓練，期使學校養成教育與設計界之專業需求得以結合。
description.en: Integrating the Knowledge and Technology parts of the Interior design profession, the course introduces the practice of National Skill Test of Interior design and Project Management. Concerning not just the updated ideas and the historical questions, it stresses also the intensive stimulated test so as to link the educational achievement and the professional expectation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-新興亞洲市場-泰國篇
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Thailand

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協五國經濟成長迅速，本課程將以泰語教學為主，泰國經貿、文化及台商現況等議題為輔，讓學生在學習泰語的同時，對泰國有更深入的認識，協助學生擴展未來在東南亞地區的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their history, culture, society and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

notes: 四英二與最後一哩合開,限50人,周一ABC節上課

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師柯舜智,北大三峽校區公學院1F04博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n

description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師洪健榮,北大三峽校區人文學院2F12博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師鍾兆春,醫大2104教室博雅選修哲學

notes: 黃蘭女英,林育聖,北大三峽校區公學院1F14博雅選修法治

name.zh: 客家族群文化與社會變遷
name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師鍾隆琛,北大三峽校區公學院1F16博雅選修文學

name.zh: 歐洲聯盟：跨國法律與政策

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師鍾隆琛,北大三峽校區社會學院1F08博雅選修哲學

name.en: Introduction and Laboratory of GMP for biotech products

description.zh: 新興生技產品的生產製造過程，絕大部分都受到不同的GMP規範，而這些GMP規範又有別於機械，電子，化工產品的GMP規範，這也是台灣生技廠的業者迫切希望學校能教授的專業課目之一。由於生技產品GMP是跟著個別產品量身訂做的，因此本課程將選定一產品，然後依序從GMP法規的概述與要求，生技GMP品質系統，標準製造流程的建立，生產流程與GMP文件之建構，到最後的實習操作與實地GMP廠查核。
description.en: Most of the newly emerged biotech products must follow their GMP guidance, which is different from the GMP in mechanical, electronic, and chemical engineering products. According to the GMP guidance is depend on the biotechnical products, this course will teach and train students the following topics: the general introduction and the requests of GMP guidance, the system of quality requirement, the establishment of standard operation protocol, the establishment of documents and how to fill in it, and the practical training and the factory auditing.

name.zh: 英文科教材教法/語言領域

臺科大材料科學與工程學系

name.zh: 化學科教材教法/自然領域

notes: 北區教資-台北護理健康大學

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)﹐內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力,亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This curriculum enters the step curriculum for the financial accounting. Intermediate accounting requires ever increasing knowledge and refinement of skills. Our goal is to achieve the most educational effective blend of concepts and practice relation to the current intermediate accounting body of knowledge. This course strives to provide the material needed to understand this subject area using IFRS. It may also be helpful to participate in accountant the license test and the government workers examination.
